name: Pineapple Hell
description:
This was originally supposed to be a small game that simulates upcoming bosses of a famous MMORPG, so that players could get prepared for the new raid in a fun way. But, after putting slightly more effort than expected, it ended up being a somewhat enjoyable game by itself.

That game, which contains 9 bosses, can be played in your browser(or downloaded) at http://tacticalairhorse.com/pineapple-simulator/ .

This is going to be a more polished version of that game with many things changed in order to make it a better standalone game.
1 out of 9 bosses done.

Any feedback is appreciated!
